Package pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api

Interface Summary
BristlebackConfig Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components.
ConfigurationAware This marker interface indicates that given implementing component (or extending interface) requires Bristleback configuration.
ConnectionStateListener<T extends IdentifiedUser> This interface is meant to be implemented by application creator to handle user connection and disconnection events.
DataController Data controller processes incoming text and binary data.
FrontController Implementations of this interface should be able to handle every control and non control message, coming from low level Websocket connector implementation.
InitialConfigurationResolver Implementations of this interface resolve configuration settings from source provided by application creator.
MessageDispatcher Message dispatcher is responsible for collecting all outbound messages and sending them in thread safe way.
SerializationEngine<T> This interface provides functionality for converting between java objects/primitives and other formats, like JSON or XML.
SerializationResolver<T> //@todo class description

Created on: 2012-01-08 14:07:10

ServerEngine This interface is a most important part of connection module.
ServletServerEngine This is an extension for ServerEngine interface.
WebsocketConnector<T> Websocket connector is an abstract representation of single client connection.
WebsocketMessage<T> Low level WebSockets message used by a Server Engine.
